title: Re: [Downtown Dharma Listserve] Readings on Compassion with Borders
content: Hi Natalia, I like the Zencast podcast, which mostly features stuff by Gil Fronsdal, a Buddhist teacher based out of San Francisco. The podcast isn't active anymore but you can find it online here: http://www.zencast.org/ Here's an episode on compassion:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/zencast/id73331418?mt=2&i=1000164762868 Letting go:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/zencast/id73331418?mt=2&i=1000113696505 On Sat, Jun 2, 2018 at 7:59 AM Natalia Rodriguez <nataliar614@gmail.com> wrote: Hi all, I'm wondering if you have any readings/podcasts on compassion with borders and on acceptance/letting go that you'd recommend. Would appreciate any guidance from the community! :) Happy weekend, Natalia -- You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google Groups "IMCW Downtown Dharma social/volunteer listserv" group. Visit this group at https://groups.google.com/group/downtowndharma. For more options, visit https://groups.google.com/d/optout. -- Scott T. Visit this group at https://groups.google.com/group/downtowndharma. For more options, visit https://groups.google.com/d/optout.
contentWithMarkup:
Hi Natalia,

I like the Zencast podcast, which mostly features stuff by Gil Fronsdal, a Buddhist teacher based out of San Francisco. The podcast isn't active anymore but you can find it online here: http://www.zencast.org/

Here's an episode on compassion: 
https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/zencast/id73331418?mt=2&i=1000164762868

Letting go: 
https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/zencast/id73331418?mt=2&i=1000113696505

On Sat, Jun 2, 2018 at 7:59 AM Natalia Rodriguez <nataliar614@gmail.com> wrote:
Hi all,

I'm wondering if you have any readings/podcasts on compassion with borders and on acceptance/letting go that you'd recommend. Would appreciate any guidance from the community! :)

Happy weekend,

Natalia


--

feed.name: Washington, DC PHP Developers And  Mission of Love Charities
feed.description: Greetings and welcome to the DCPHP Blog . Whether you want to know what's going on, who's hiring, tips and tricks, or generally want to meet and talk with some other smart people, this is the place for you. We hope to be your one-stop shop for all things
